channel.title: Server hosting
channel.description: I would love to develop and manage a server with buildcraft industrialcraft² and redpower2 on it but the problem is that my computer can't handle it and i don't have any money to do so. Does anyone have a vps or wants to host himself, you will be co-owner even when i do get the money to buy a vps. I don't know if this is allowed on here but there aren't much BC IC RP servers out there and they are very good mods.

item.title: Server hosting
item.dc:creator: @whattehp406 whattehp406
